servinfo.title: Valves and Cylinder Head Removal and Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Valves and Cylinder Head Components:For J20 Engine

s1.ptxt: Remove engine assembly from vehicle referring to Engine Assembly Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine .
Remove oil pan referring to Oil Pan and Oil Pump Strainer Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine .
Remove cylinder head cover referring to Cylinder Head Cover Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine .
Remove timing chain cover. Refer to Timing Chain Cover Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine for removal.

Remove 2nd timing chain and 1st timing chain. Refer to 2nd Timing Chain and Chain Tensioner Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine and 1st Timing Chain and Chain Tensioner Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine for removal.
Remove camshafts, tappets and shims. Refer to Camshafts, Tappet and Shim Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine for removal.
Loosen cylinder head bolts (M10) in such order as numbered in figure and remove them.

attention3.ptxt: Don’t forget to remove cylinder head bolt (M6) (3) as shown in figure.

s1.ptxt: Check all around cylinder head for any other parts required to be removed or disconnected and remove or disconnect whatever necessary.
Remove cylinder head with intake manifold, exhaust manifold and water outlet cap. Use lifting device, if necessary.

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Valves and Cylinder Head Disassembly and Assembly:For J20 Engine

s1.ptxt: Match match mark (1) on crank timing sprocket and mating surface (2) of cylinder block and lower crankcase.
Clean mating surface of cylinder head and cylinder block (2). Remove oil, old gasket and dust from mating surface.
Install knock pins (3) to cylinder block.
Install new cylinder head gasket (1) to cylinder block. Identification number (6) provided on gasket comes to crankshaft pulley side (4), facing up (toward cylinder head side).
Install cylinder head to cylinder block.
Apply engine oil to cylinder head bolts and tighten them gradually as follows.

s2.ptxt: Tighten cylinder head bolts (M10) to 52 N·m (5.2 kgf-m, 38.0 lbf-ft) according to numerical order in figure.
In the same manner as in step a), retighten cylinder head bolts (M10) to 82 N·m (8.2 kgf-m, 59.5 lbf-ft).
Loosen cylinder head bolts (M10) until tightening torque is reduced to 0 according to numerical order in figure.
Tighten cylinder head bolts (M10) to 52 N·m (5.2 kgf-m, 38.0 lbf-ft) according to numerical order in figure.
In the same manner as in step b), retighten cylinder head bolts (M10) to 103 N·m (10.3 kgf-m, 74.5 lbf-ft).
Tighten cylinder head bolt (M6) to specified torque.

torqueitem.t-note: Tighten 52 N·m (5.2 kgf-m, 38.0 lbf-ft), 82 N·m (8.2 kgf-m, 59.5 lbf-ft), 0 N·m (0 kgf-m, 0 lbf-ft), 52 N·m (5.2 kgf-m, 38.0 lbf-ft) and 103 N·m (10.3 kgf-m, 74.5 lbf-ft) by the specified procedure.

s1.ptxt: Install camshafts and tappets and shims. Refer to Camshafts, Tappet and Shim Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine for installation.
Install 1st timing chain. Refer to 1st Timing Chain and Chain Tensioner Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine for installation.
Install 2nd timing chain. Refer to 2nd Timing Chain and Chain Tensioner Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine for installation.
Install timing chain cover. Refer to Timing Chain Cover Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine for installation.
Check intake and exhaust valve lashes referring to Valve Lash (Clearance) Inspection:For J20 Engine .
Install cylinder head cover referring to Cylinder Head Cover Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine .
Install oil pan referring to Oil Pan and Oil Pump Strainer Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine .
Install engine assembly to vehicle referring to Engine Assembly Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine .
